resources.string: To discover your hardware, this app needs permission to scan for nearby Bluetooth devices.
To interact with your Bluetooth devices after they are found, this app requires permission to connect to and exchange data with them.
To allow other devices to discover and connect to this app, permission to advertise over Bluetooth is required.
On this version of Android, location access is required to find nearby Bluetooth devices. Your location data is not stored or used for any other purpose.
This app needs to manage Bluetooth settings to find other devices or make itself visible.
